dct_title_s: Map of the Mother Lode, Amador County, California
dct_description_sm: Shows drainage, township, section, and quarter lines, mines, etc.
Negative photocopy of ms. map in the Library of Congress.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
